column1: Topic title: OTAI REFORMASI   FREE ANWAR   IDUP DSAI   PETISYEN

column8: rWTRF4GWz00Group petitions Agong to pardon AnwarPublished on May 7, 2017Several groups sent a memorandum to the newly-installed Yang di-Pertuan Agong Sultan Muhammad V to pardon jailed Opposition de-facto leader Anwar Ibrahim in time for the 14th general election.SlqCt5Ho8MkBebas Anwar: Otai Reformasi hantar memo pada AgongPublished on May 7, 2017Kumpulan Otai Reformasi hari ini menyerahkan memorandum di hadapan Istana Negara meminta Yang Di-Pertuan Agong memberi pengampunan diraja kepada bekas ketua pembangkang Datuk Seri Anwar Ibrahim.Tindakan Otai Reformasi meminta campur tangan Agong dalam usaha terakhir membebaskan Anwar sebelum pilihan raya umum ke-14.Memorandum tersebut diserahkan kepada wakil istana, Che Hilmy Che Musa.

Why politician like to drag King to their matter. If ask the King to monitor for clean election okayla. Just wait for general election. Its near. Plus Anwar is old, people want progressive younger person as PM. Don't care la anak buah Anwar ke Mahathir, just don't want them directly be PM. Azmin Ali pun okay, not weak like Anwar, which can talk only.
senior citizen gathering. sure la old timers look out for other old timers.
Muhammad V seriously sounds like a name made by some culturally-insensitive intern designing characters for Street Fighter V
You are rite. For me, Azmin pon ok. These old folks are so obsessed with anwar thing like he is the chosen messiah...
